name: Powershell Local Email Collection
description: Adversaries may target user email on local systems to collect sensitive information. Files containing email data can be acquired from a users local system, such as Outlook storage or cache files.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`powershell.file.script_block_text:(*Get\-Inbox.ps1* OR *Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook* OR *Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.olDefaultFolders* OR *\-comobject\ outlook.application*)`
